main event: A civilian pilot observed an unidentified flying object over Guadalupe Pass, Texas on 13 October 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as brilliant and round with no visible trail., It was observed traveling at a speed of 400 mph., The pilot observed the object for approximately 1.5 minutes., There was no physical evidence or photographs collected during the observation., The conclusion of the investigation indicated the object remained unidentified.
